name: Bitcoin Free
description:
This is a simple free game which gives you real, free bitcoin every hour!
this is the highest paying free bitcoin app available.

It's really simple to use - just enter your bitcoin wallet address and press a button and we'll give you your first free bitcoins :) ..

.. not only that but you can claim more from us EVERY HOUR!

Then every week we pay out all users with a registered bitcoin wallet address and a balance of at least 20,000 satoshi.

There is no gambling in this app, as there is nothing to spend money on. It's just a free game, that gives away free bitcoin.
Apple is not a sponsor and is not involved in any way with our rewards and give-aways.
We reserve the right to deny payouts to any users suspected of fraudulent activity.
